titleStmt.title: The royal funeral:, or, The mourning state and solemnity of the funeral of Mary, Queen of England, &c. Who was intered at Westminster, on the fifth of March, 1695. : To the tune of, Hopes Farewel, &c. : Licens'd and enter'd according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Deacon, at the Angel in Guilt-spur street, without Newgate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library, Chicago, Illinois.

place.placeName: the Angel in Guilt-spur street, without Newgate
